Dear All,

Seems convert query into matrix URIs would be more readable. But=
 how does html form support this?
For instance, I convert

/parent/children=
[]=3Dchild1&children[]=3Dchild2&children[]=3Dchild3

into

/parent/child1;c=
hild2;child3

For the original URI I can use a form which use GET and some =
checkboxes to implement it.
But for the matrix one, do I only have to use j=
avascript? Thanks.

Best regards,
Zhi-Qiang Lei
zhiqiang.lei@...
